true_statement: The capital of France is Paris.
false_statement: The capital of France is Berlin.

true_statement: The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
false_statement: The capital of Japan is Beijing.

true_statement: The capital of Australia is Canberra.
false_statement: The capital of Australia is Sydney.

true_statement: The capital of Brazil is Brasilia.
false_statement: The capital of Brazil is Rio de Janeiro.

true_statement: The capital of Canada is Ottawa.
false_statement: The capital of Canada is Toronto.

true_statement: Water freezes at zero degrees Celsius.
false_statement: Water freezes at fifty degrees Celsius.

true_statement: Water boils at one hundred degrees Celsius.
false_statement: Water boils at fifty degrees Celsius.

true_statement: The Earth orbits around the Sun.
false_statement: The Sun orbits around the Earth.

true_statement: Light travels faster than sound.
false_statement: Sound travels faster than light.

true_statement: Diamonds are made of carbon.
false_statement: Diamonds are made of silicon.

true_statement: World War II ended in 1945.
false_statement: World War II ended in 1950.

true_statement: The first human walked on the moon in 1969.
false_statement: The first human walked on the moon in 1959.

true_statement: The Berlin Wall fell in 1989.
false_statement: The Berlin Wall fell in 1979.

true_statement: Christopher Columbus sailed to America in 1492.
false_statement: Christopher Columbus sailed to America in 1592.

true_statement: The French Revolution began in 1789.
false_statement: The French Revolution began in 1689.

true_statement: Two plus two equals four.
false_statement: Two plus two equals five.

true_statement: Seven times eight equals fifty-six.
false_statement: Seven times eight equals sixty-four.

true_statement: The square root of sixteen is four.
false_statement: The square root of sixteen is eight.

true_statement: Ten divided by two equals five.
false_statement: Ten divided by two equals four.

true_statement: Three squared equals nine.
false_statement: Three squared equals six.
